Home Projects Teaching Reads

Reads

Below are some of my favorite reads.

Fiction

  • Cryptonomicon by Neal Stephenson
  • Ficciones by Jorge Luis Borges
  • Le Club des incorrigibles optimistes by Jean-Michel Guenassia
  • Solaris by Stanisław Lem
  • The God of Small Things by Arundhati Roy
  • The Overstory by Richard Powers
  • The Unbearable Lightness of Being by Milan Kundera
  • Invisible Cities by Italo Calvino

Non-Fiction

  • Gödel, Escher, Bach: an Eternal Golden Braid by Douglas Hofstader
  • QCD: The Strange Theory of Light and Matter by Richard Feynman
  • Man and His Symbols by Carl Gustav Jung
  • The Society of the Mind by Marvin Minsky
  • Ideas That Created the Future: Classic Papers of Computer Science by Harry R. Lewis
  • Principles of Neural Design by Peter Sterling and Simon Laughlin
